entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • The --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` and `dotnet watch run` should fallback to a case-insensitive match if a case-sensitive match isn't found #25868
    7.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support calling unique launch profiles with a case-insensitive nature & Improve errors around launch profiles #28908
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28905

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
